snippet: Wendy Whelan, the longtime New York City Ballet star who has been making a critically acclaimed foray into modern dance, announced Friday that she was postponing a national tour this spring because she needs more time to heal from hip surgery.
abstract: Wendy Whelan, the longtime New York City Ballet star who has been making a critically acclaimed foray into modern dance, announced Friday that she was postponing a national tour this spring because she needs more time to heal from hip surgery.

headline.main: Recovering From Surgery, Wendy Whelan Postpones National Dance Tour
